metadata.title: Why Does It Suddenly Turn OFF When Touching for a While?

sections.content:
Question:
Why does the judgement suddenly switch to OFF when the electrode is touched for a while?
Answer:
Long Press Cancel may have been activated.
If Long Press Cancel is enabled, ON is judged by the value set as Continuous Touch Duration,
The drift correction process is executed.
It can be cancelled by disabling long press cancel.
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
